name: SigniantPlatformStatus
0:
”Alexa, ask Signiant for a status report”
”Alexa, ask Signiant what is Media Shuttle”
”Alexa, ask Signiant for Flight status”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: signiant
des:
Want to find out the operational status of Signiant's cloud services? Want to know the status of Media Shuttle or Flight?Alexa will tell you if there is currently a problem with any of Signiant's services.

Alexa will generate a service status report based on the information available on status.signiant.com. You can find out the status of the following Signiant services

Media Shuttle
Flight
Transfer API (v1 and v2)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
